name: uFactory
description: uFactory is a strategic factory building game where space and cash are limited, but production is not, and efficiency is king. Develop your production lines and rethink your layout as you race against the clock to meet your quotas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 3.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
